definitions: belonging to a period other than that being portrayed

examples.text: 'Titus' benefits from the effective use of anachronistic elements like cars and loudspeakers

shortDefinitions: belonging to period other than that being portrayed

definitions: belonging or appropriate to an earlier period, especially so as to seem conspicuously old-fashioned

examples.text: she is rebelling against the anachronistic morality of her parents

shortDefinitions: belonging or appropriate to earlier period
